text: The problem was due to a combination of in-line field declaration/initialisations, and using the template pattern during instance initialization.  It's very easy to miss the fact that the field initialisations run _after_ the super constructor, which called fillFields() on the current class first.
Thanks for the patch Josh, applied to svn
